skill.name: World Without Light
skill.value: Deals 1644/1964 DMG to all enemies, with a moderate chance of inflicting Silence.

ability.name: Sensory Deprivation (Lv. 60)
ability.value: Slightly reduces DMG dealt by all foes at the start of each wave.

ability.name: Sealer of Gods (Lv. 75)
ability.value: Moderate chance of inflicting Petrifaction on all foes at the start of each wave.
